glosses: wretched, pitiful, pathetic; arousing pity, sympathy, or compassion
pathetic, deplorable; arousing scorn or contempt, often due to miserable inadequacy.

examples.text: çok acınası bir yaşam şekli, yazık!
examples.translation: what a deplorable/pathetic way of living, how sad!

etymology: By surface analysis, acı- (“to hurt; to pity”) + -n + -ası.
